cnd5:9.2: paññapesi → paññapehi (sya-all) | paññāpesi (mr), uttānīkarosi → uttānīkarohi (sya-all) | uttāniṃ karosi (mr)
cnd5:15.13: araññavanapatthāni → araññe vanapatthāni (bj), manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, sya-all)
cnd5:16.8: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vā cittassa → pañcasuvā kāmagunesuvā cittassa (bj) | pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittassa (cck) | pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa (sya1ed, sya2ed), vosaggo → vossaggo (bahūsu), anaṭṭhitakiriyatā → anaṭṭhitatā (sya-all) | aniṭṭhitakiriyatā (mr)
cnd5:17.2: nandī → nandi (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), paligedho → paḷigedho (bj), suttaṃ visaṭā → sottaṃ visatā (sya-all) | sattā visatā (pts-vp-pli1ed), santhavo → sandhavo (mr), āsīsanā → āsiṃsanā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), sādhukamyatā → sādukamyatā (bj) | asādhukammatā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
cnd5:18.2: gabbhaṭṭhitimūlakaṃ → gabbheṭhitimūlakaṃ (sya-all, mr), ḍāho → ḍaho (bj, sya-all), rakhasā → rakkhasā (mr), lohitapittaṃ → lohitaṃ pittaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
cnd5:28.1: vibhajitāni → vibhattāni (mr), seyyathidaṃ → seyyathīdaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
cnd5:40.3: yācasi → āyācasi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | ayācasi (cck), ajjhesasi → ajjhesi (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
